acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: CR is put up today.    Seen the petition No. 2283/2019 filed by learned advocate appearing on behalf of the accused person along with copy of order passed by Hon&amp#039ble Gauhati High Court in connection with Crl.Pet. 1198/19 corresponding to GR case No. 887/16 wherin further proceeding of the case is stayed until the returnable date.       Accordingly the proceeding of the case is hereby stayed till furter order. Re-call the NBWA issued  against the accused person Shri Rupam Mali. Let a copy of this order be sent to concerned P.S for information and necessary action.
